name: Mech Racer 30K (Coasal)
description:
Welcome racers to the year 206X, robot racing has replaced NASCAR as a new form of entertainment sports as the World Robotic Racing Grand Prix. Once every four years teams from around the world come to compete and to show off their racing talent. With their latest model of robotic vehicles, these racers compete for the glory of their countries and to earn the prized World Robotic Racing Cup.

Now get set, rev your engines, and prepare to hold onto your butts as you race and battle your way to the victory circle!

*Requires PS4 Controllers to play
